original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify them (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).
optimized_prompt:
<instructions>
    Extract named entities from the provided text and classify each entity into one of the following categories: <category>Person</category>, <category>Location</category>, <category>Organization</category>, or <category>Other</category>.
  </instructions>
  <context>
    The input text contains information relevant to entities that may fall into distinct categories. Ensure to differentiate between entities while extracting them.
  </context>
  <steps>
    <step>Identify all named entities present in the text.</step>
    <step>Classify each identified entity into the specified categories.</step>
    <step>Format the output as a list of entities with their corresponding categories.</step>
  </steps>
  <example>
    <input>Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS 1996-08-22 The European Commission said on Thursday it disagreed with German advice to consumers...</input>
    <output>
      <entity>
        <name>Peter Blackburn</name>
        <category>Person</category>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>BRUSSELS</name>
        <category>Location</category>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>European Commission</name>
        <category>Organization</category>
      </entity>
    </output>
  </example>
